entry.title: Version 2.0.0 is live !
entry.summary:
Version 2.0.0 is live and brings a lot of improvments from last versions. The store has completely been revamped (mainly on the data refresh part). The documentation got an upgrade aswell.

  • Follow accounts, get balances and transaction counts
  • Get blo...
